pull_requests.title: BIP94 PR1781 editorial fixups
pull_requests.body: Addresses https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1781#discussion_r1985677753 ("Parameters"), writes "Testnet 4" in the same manner as the BIP author, and removes an extra EOL space.

comment_list.body:
> ACK [4e24381](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/commit/4e24381bbadec610739a320070f69e3f17315c13)

Thanks! Rebased for the CI, no other change.

pull_requests.title: BIP119: appease typos linter
pull_requests.body:
The linter is raising with the following (e.g., in #1780 and #1783) that is resolved by this patch.

```bash
~/bitcoin/bips$ typos
error: `TYP` should be `TYPO`
  --> ./bip-0119.mediawiki:594:73
    |
594 | is set to CTVHASH_ALL. Other programs could be added similar to SIGHASH_TYPEs.
```

comment_list.body: Hi, can I get this PR merged? @jonatack @psztorc
@wgyt I'd prefer to have approval from the BIP author on this change.
